title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client library for Ollama, enabling Node.js and browser apps to chat with local models via the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via PyPI and integrate local LLM inference into Python scripts or notebooks with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain partner package that adds Ollama as a first-class LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI) that lets you chat with local models, manage them, and import GGUF files through a clean interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous & asynchronous APIs, streaming, and embedding support; published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API, supporting chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper written in Go that adds conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates to the base ollama command.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub-Copilot-like assistant with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams responses from Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands and per-user quotas.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom integration exposing Ollama models as conversation agents for local, private voice/text automation.

title: ollama-cam
summary: Real-time object-description demo that pipes webcam frames into Ollama vision models (llava) and speaks the output.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Official NestJS module that injects an Ollama service into your Node.js backend for chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter template pre-wired with ollama-js, swagger docs, and REST endpoints for chat, embeddings, and listing models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that connects to a local Ollama instance and supports multiple models, conversation history export, and parameter tuning.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support, PVC model cache, and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines so you can run LLM-based tests without external calls.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio and serde.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with chat, generate, embeddings, and model management; distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local Ollama models to summarize notes, generate ideas, or answer questions inside your vault.
